Great cocktails in a funky space.
Delicious, creative dishes, especially the pastelon.

This fresh spot will have you rethinking indulging late night. With a decent beer selection, very matter-of-fact delicious cocktails and tantalizing bites, this place is a nice change of pace.  The "mixologists" take their orders quite seriously; I zoned out to the scent of fresh-peeled orange rinds, bright green leaves being muddled, and clouds of smoke from burnt herbs.  I enjoyed the Maracuya which was served in a beaker, but found the Flor de Uva a bit too sweet for my taste.  Our vegan journey began with a plate of two crisp, but not oily, empanadas: one reminiscent of flavors in a samosa and the other more "standard", but overall forgettable.  The pastelón de plátano maduro was a small dish of smooth, ripe plátano puree and savory "ground meat" that was nicely seasoned and had a texture that could fool any meat lover.  The quipe, a lighter and brighter plant-based plate, was "super saludable" combining earthy legumes and fresh vegetables.  Dessert, a chia brûlée, fell flat.  It lacked the buttery mouthfeel of a custard and ended up a gritty gelatin, with the sheets of sugar the only nod to a crème brûlée.

Absolutely horrible. Placed an order that was confirmed and even sent a message that it would be delivered soon. The food never came and the restaurant doesn’t answer the phone. The kicker: THIS ISN’T THE FIRST TIME THIS HAS HAPPENED! You can do better.

Love this place. The food is amazing, prices are good, and drinks are worth breaking with my habit of just ordering the cheapest beer. This is one of my go-to's in the neighborhood for a nice dinner/drinks. It does get a little louder as the night goes on, but I like the atmosphere.

They serve vegan food, fantastic mixed cocktails, and have a lowkey, highclass atmosphere. I love everything about this little gem in the neighborhood and so thankful there's this bar in Washington Heights. I always come here when I just want a one-on-one night with my close friends or my boo. The bartenders are actually knowledgeable and will whip up the most amazingly delicious concoction, all you need is tell them the general flavors and things you like in a drink. This bar truly lives up to its name!
Unique drinks
Good drinks, delicious spicy guacamole I only wish the chips were of a bit higher quality.  Good value and I would have liked to try more on the menu should I have had the opportunity.
Staff? Da bomb. Food? Da bomb. Drinks? DA BOMB!! This place rocks. Everything is worth coming back for. A+++
Delicious food and drinks nice ambiance
Great drinks and food.
Would def go here again. They custom make drinks for you as well. Left here lit af with some great friends.
Loved the atmosphere, drinks and super friendly service
Great vegan food I loved it! Will definitely come back!
The food was very reasonable, but the portions were too modest for what we paid. The music was very loud, but I guess the place looks awesome.

Best Vegan spot in Washington heights! A hidden gem within the Dominican community offering amazing service, great food and a beautiful setting. I highly recommend Pocion Lounge to all vegans and non vegans 👍🏾💯

What a unique place!!! Great cocktails with unique herbal ingredients! They have absinthe here too. While they do have a beer and wine selection, it is the craft cocktails that make this special, while they tend to be on the expensive side. The avocado ice cream dessert is amazing and made in house! Definitely try it and their other natural foods as well.

Awesome smokey cocktails
Vegan eats. Fabulous craft cocktails. Nice, chick decor and dark lighting. Mauricio the bartender is fantastic.

Upscale cocktail bar with vegan tapas. I first went here because I am a vegan, but found it's really more about the cocktails and not the food. They don't have anything large enough to be a real meal but everything I have gotten there has been delicious. The prices are higher than i would usually spend going out for drinks but the cocktails are so good it's worth it.

Great Experience. My Girlfriend and I are so happy to find a Great Vegan Small Bite Bar Within Walking Distance, While Also Including A Professional Mixologist Mauricio Whom Made Some Delighted Cocktails. That Dude Is The Man! The Food Was 9.5-10. We'll Definitely Coming For More🔥✊🏾💯
I got my life there and the staff can cook their asses off.

Pocion is one of my favorite places ever! My boyfriend and I met here a year ago and we came back for both our 6 months and 1 year. For our anniversary last night, I had let them know ahead we were coming to see if we could do something special! They said they'd make my man a surprise drink! The owner Mauricio made my boyfriend a special award winning cocktail that he had created:) we'd spent time with Mauricio on our 6 months and it was so exciting to see him again.  He then made us a special cocktail representing us that he then let us help him name before posting it on instagram :) "El Memorable" Watching them make the drinks is such an art. They use beautiful ingredients and do it in a creative spectical. Always delicious!!!  The night flowed on with many beautiful drinks and amazing food! I recommend the Sliders or Tacos- vegan and gone in two seconds because we loved them so much! But everything has been good!  They made us delicious cocktails all night and even gave shots to us for more celebrating. Mauro then announced to the restaurant that it was our anniversary and the amazing night ended in a cheers. It was literally the perfect night. We go any time we get a special occasion and will be trying to go even more often. Seriously give it a shot! ❤️❤️

The place was really nice, ambience really nice but the bar tender was a bit rude and pretentious. I actually felt uncomfortable even asking for my tab. Other than that, nice cozy spot. Would’ve had more stars if it weren’t for the service.
Best drinks and vegan eats uptown!
Food ended b4 midnight and I jad just left a concert at United Palace. Would have been nice to have at least appetizers with our drinks.

The best cocktails I've gotten in Manhattan, no seriously their drinks are unreal and crafted to perfection. Service is awesome and the space is really nice. Can easily recommend to anyone finding themselves uptown!

Place is awesome. The vegan tapas are so good this should be a full-blown restaurant... in any case, it’s the perfect balance of amazing unique drinks and delicious vegan tapas. Came here with my awesome girlfriend and she loved it too.

On the two Friday nights I've been here, it was quite slow--great for quick service, but I definitely hope it's usually busy other times, as it deserves it.  The dim lighting and Latin music make for an interesting ambiance. The theme of nature and science coming together shows throughout; the overhead Edison lights are surrounded by test tube chandeliers, and there's a wall of plants growing out of beakers.  There are also some dropper bottles for drink additions on the back wall. It's certainly unique, though I don't have much to compare to, as this is the first vegan bar I've come across.  The drinks I've had have been great. I go for weaker drinks, and they made wonderful ones, including a foamy amaretto sour. The food is also fantastic. The selection is not your standard bar fare and owns toward Latin food--amazing, as it seems hard to come by vegan Latin food. I've had the empanadas, maduro, and creme brulee--all amazing, and the presentation is that of a high-end restaurant.  Overall, I think this tiny bar deserves all 5 stars. You can tell they work hard to earn them.
True mixology bar....original cocktails !
Absolutely delicious!!!
Like no other place in the heights!. Truly in love of the delicious food, unique cocktails, powerful concept!. Service is awesome, Mauricio is great!! (Just good vibes)

Quiet place with vegan food, but they go all out on the drinks.  Their happy hour margarita is made in a beaker and they use salted foam instead of salting the rim.

Definitely sexy, definitely right on time with the vegan menu! Came for their summer menu launch event and enjoyed a Guanabana Rum Añejo with lime and watercress tincture, and a vegan version of traditional Dominican chambre (and a great live band!). Looking forward to returning with a date or friends.
The drinks are great. The food is all vegan and great. The bartenders are amazing. Everything about the place will make you keep coming back.

I really appreciate this place because there's nothing like it in Washington Heights yet. My fiance and I are foodies and we stopped by to check this place out, we order 4 different drinks to taste and it was delicious. We truly appreciated the time and artistry the mixologist put into those drinks, each drink was unique. The mix of elixirs, herbs, and liquor is truly amazing and well balanced.
Great, cozy place.  Limited menu, but everything we had was terrific.  Super friendly staff, and easy to get to.  Everything's vegan!  <3
Great drinks, excellent service, one of a kind bar near Washington heights.
Food is wonderful drinks are well made.  The staff dresses well and are very nice.
Great empanadas, ginger cocktails & plantain

Oooh, a sexy bar with craft cocktails in the Heights! Felix, Frances, and Martin mix magic potions to match any whim. Uniquely creative apps also. Seriously. Go here. Take a date and slink up to the bar.

A fun and healthy atmosphere in Washington Heights. Everyone seems chill in this dimly lit venue. Their music is on point and the bartenders work hard to make it a positive experience for all.
Loved the ambiance, the music, the food and the interesting, but delicious cocktails!!
Frances is a true mixologist
Good
Real good cocktails, friendly prices, and good happy hour specials. Decor is aight.
Delicious food great ambiance tasty creative drinks.  I'll definitely be coming back

The drinks are wonderful. I had a cocktail with kale and it was definitely one of the best drinks I've ever had in Washington Heights. The cocktail program is very well thought out. Even if the bartenders are trying to bring that "mixologists who take themselves too seriously" attitude uptown. The prices arent like downtown, so thanks for that.  However, food wise, the whole vegan tapas thing is underwhelming. Maybe if they added some fish to the menu I'd be more inclined to eat there.  The design and décor are terrible however. Everything is stark white and it feels clinical. The large windows make you feel like you're sitting in a fish bowl. The place is set up so the only desirable seats are at the bar. The rest of the seating is an afterthought.  Also, they will have to open up their spirits selection, because somebody is going to want a Jack & Coke, or heaven forbid a Long Island iced tea, and they need to be able to make it--quickly with a smile and get back to the tinctures and potions without missing a step or snubbing their nose at them.
This place was great. Some pretty fantastic vegan food and the drinks were fantastic. Highly recommended!
Delicious drinks, try the Dark & Stormy with Eau de violette and fresh ginger. Vegan ceviche also great! The "creme brulee" a bit grainy but served with a tasty strawberry pineapple compote.
Amazing drinks and delicious food!!!

This bar is wonderful. Although it's vegan and every food and drink is filled with healthy ingredients, the ambiance is not earthy crunchy at all. Regular dimly lit lounge, bar and a few tables. The drinks are top shelf and they even have gluten free vodka. The staff are friendly and seem to enjoy talking about the concept and the food. Gotta go !
Great service. Great drinks. Love this place.
